memberdef.name: CASATHROW
memberdef.initializer: do { \ std::ostringstream casa_log_oss; \ casa_log_oss << arg; \ throw exc(casa_log_oss.str()); \ } while (0)

memberdef.name: WarnCc
memberdef.initializer: {\ LogIO os(LogOrigin("", __func__, __LINE__, WHERE));\ os << LogIO::WARN << m << LogIO::POST;\ }
